project_descr: The overall objective of the project is to create an enabling national environment for the promotion of youth employment and enterprise development to support poverty reduction initiatives in Lesotho.

outputs.output_descr: The overall objective of the project is to create an enabling national environment for the promotion of youth employment and enterprise development to support poverty reduction initiatives in Lesotho. The project will strengthen the national institutional capacity of the Government of Lesotho to develop a broad based National Action Plan on  Youth Employment and establishing of the National Youth Council, in consultation with all the critical stakeholders, including youth organisations, the business community, trade unions and the civil society.

project_title: promotion of youth employment towards poverty reduction
